resources.string:
<!DOCTYPE html><html>
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>История</title>
<style>
.wrapper {
    width: 600pt;
    word-wrap: break-word;
}
.vertical_holder {
    height: 10pt;
}
.msg_top {
    display: flex;
}
.msg_bottom {
    height: 10pt;
}
.msg_left {
    width: 130pt;
}
.msg_right {
    width: 80%
}
.message {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}
.date {
    font-size: 80%;
    font-style: italic;
    font-weight: lighter;
}
.name {
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #230E36;
}
.message_body {
}
.attach_desc {
    font-size: 90%;
}
.attach_photos {
}
.attach_photo {
    max-width: 47%;
    vertical-align: top;
}
.attach_link {
}
.attach_video {
}
.attach_post {
    margin-left: 10%;
}
.attach_audio {
}
.attach_sticker {
}
.attach_doc {
}
.forwarded_messages {
    margin-left: 10%;
}
</style>
    </head>
    <body>
        <div class="wrapper">
